trans-unit.source: Specifies the behaviors of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Specifica i comportamenti di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> dell'oggetto un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> controllare quando il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> si fa clic.

trans-unit.source: The HotSpotMode enumeration represents the behaviors that you can apply to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object within an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: L'enumerazione HotSpotMode rappresenta i comportamenti che è possibile applicare a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>oggetto all'interno di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties use these enumeration values to set the behavior of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà utilizzano questi valori di enumerazione per impostare il comportamento di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>dell'oggetto quando viene selezionato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specified on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object takes precedence over the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the control.
trans-unit.target: Se entrambe le proprietà sono impostate, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà specificata su ogni singolo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>oggetto ha la precedenza sul <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.NotSet` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> gets its behavior from the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Se si specifica `HotSpotMode.NotSet` per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà di un singolo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>oggetto, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>Ottiene il comportamento dal contenitore <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property is either `NotSet` or no value is specified, the default behavior is to navigate to a URL.
trans-unit.target: In questo scenario, se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>la proprietà `NotSet` o viene specificato alcun valore, il comportamento predefinito consiste nel passare a un URL.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control's behavior is not specified using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects it contains, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>del comportamento di controllo non è specificato utilizzando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>in esso contenuto, per impostazione predefinita è il comportamento `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects that an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control contains are set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` and no value is specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the default behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>gli oggetti di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>controllo contiene sono impostate su `HotSpotMode.NotSet` e viene specificato alcun valore per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, il comportamento predefinito è `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.Navigate` for either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the page navigates to a URL when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se si specifica `HotSpotMode.Navigate` per uno di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, la pagina accede a un URL quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>si fa clic su.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the URL to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per specificare l'URL a cui passare.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.PostBack` for either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the page generates a postback to the server when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se si specifica `HotSpotMode.PostBack` per uno di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, la pagina genera un postback al server quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>si fa clic su.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property to specify a name for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>proprietà per specificare un nome per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This name will be passed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> event data when the postback event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Questo nome verrà passato il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>dati dell'evento quando si verifica l'evento di postback.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando un postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>si fa clic, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>viene generato l'evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: A livello di codice le azioni eseguite durante un postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>è fatto clic, fornire un gestore eventi per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.Inactive` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object does not have any behavior when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se si specifica `HotSpotMode.Inactive` per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>oggetto non ha alcun comportamento quando viene selezionato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this value to create an inactive hot spot within a larger active hot spot.
trans-unit.target: Per creare un'area sensibile inattiva all'interno di un'area sensibile attiva più grande, è possibile utilizzare questo valore.

trans-unit.source: This option is provided to allow you to create more complex hot spot zones within an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Questa opzione è disponibile per consentire la creazione di aree sensibili più complesse in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: To create an inactive area within an active hot spot, you must specify the inactive hot spot before the active one in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Per creare un'area inattiva all'interno di un'area sensibile attiva, è necessario specificare l'area sensibile inattiva prima di quello attivo nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> defines an active ring by specifying an inactive circular hot spot within a larger active circular hot spot: ``` <asp:ImageMap ID="SaturnImage" ImageUrl="~/saturn.PNG" runat="server" OnClick="SaturnImage_Click"> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="planet" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="planet" Radius=40 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot HotSpotMode=Inactive Radius=60 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="rings" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="rings" Radius=80 X=100 Y=100 /> </asp:ImageMap> ```
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>definisce un anello attivo specificando un'area sensibile circolare inattiva all'interno di un'area sensibile circolare attiva più grande: ``` <asp:ImageMap ID="SaturnImage" ImageUrl="~/saturn.PNG" runat="server" OnClick="SaturnImage_Click"> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="planet" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="planet" Radius=40 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot HotSpotMode=Inactive Radius=60 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="rings" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="rings" Radius=80 X=100 Y=100 /> </asp:ImageMap> ``` </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> does not have any behavior.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> non ha alcun comportamento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> navigates to a URL.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> accede a un URL.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> uses the behavior set by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode*> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> utilizza il comportamento di un'impostazione di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode*>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control does not define the behavior, the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object navigates to a URL.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> controllo non definisce il comportamento, il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> oggetto accede a un URL.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> generates a postback to the server.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> genera un postback al server.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
